summary: A few new guys to romp around skyrim:)
descriptionHtml:
*******REQUIRED APACHIISKYHAIR************** Sorry forgot to mention that:/


Okay so I decided to go ahead and release Oliver since he doesn\'t look too bad with vanilla eyes. He\'s not perfect in my eyes but I\'m freaking picky:) Draven I like a lot, I\'m glad I turned on the ole laptop and messed around with a new character. He is at 500 health and 500 stamina and is in iron armor with an ebony sword and bow. I even gave him some arrows LoL which I usually forget:) Oliver is in fur armor which doesn\'t suit him at all so I recommend getting him into your own armor set up pronto:/ Anyway both of them are a marriage option, Oliver can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. Sorry to those that have my other boys, the Sleeping Giant in is probably at capacity:/ Draven is in Whiterun, up in the main hall of Dragonsreach. Don\'t shoot them or they will die, but if you do there is that handy resurrect command for the console but you lose everything you have given them so watch the friendly fire:) Just pretend it is hardcore team deathmatch:) Hope you enjoy them:)

 There are a few must have mods for this, just for the look to be correct
 you should have the following mods...

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488] BetterMales Beautiful Nudes and Faces[/url], use the Younger Faces Merged with Men by Geonox.
 For the body use the same BetterMales mod FavoredSoulMeshes body of your choosing.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13076] Cute Eyes 115X[/url] Makes the iris in the eye bigger to escape the tiny eye look. Oliver looks better with Vanilla eyes tho IMHO.

Installation: NMM recommended.

Manual, put the Draven.esp or Oliver.esp file in your skyrim/data file. The textures and meshes files drop into the Skyrim/Data file in
textures and meshes. Hopefully you know the drill:) Open the Nexus Mod Manager to make sure the plugin is active and if you
 are running UFO make sure Draven or Oliver plugin is after UFO in the load order.


Uninstallation: NMM delete Draven or Oliver Follower Mod.
Manual, Delete Draven or Oliver.esp file from Skyrim/Data file. Delete Draven or Oliver.esp
 in Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint file. Delete Draven or Oliver.esp from your
 Skyrim/Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom file. Win.




**********As Usual [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19733]The Immersive Armor[/url] mod by Hothtrooper44 is recommended:)***************
[URL=http://imgur.com/Xn66a][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xn66a.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
author: SerecenHwke
